Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails and prioritize tasks for the week. Based on the goals provided, the primary focus will be on root cause analysis of data quality issues and categorization of these causes.
Review the list of identified data quality issues. Compile all relevant documentation related to these issues, including error logs, user reports, and previous analyses.
Begin root cause analysis for the first data quality issue. Review system logs, audit trails, and data entry processes associated with the issue.
Consult with @mrs-1 (Medical Records Specialist) to understand the data entry workflow and potential points of error for the specific issue. Document all findings.
Document preliminary findings and potential root causes in a structured report.
Continue root cause analysis for the second data quality issue. Focus on identifying patterns or similarities with the first issue.
Email @da-1 (Data Analyst) to request relevant data extracts and reports that may assist in the root cause analysis. The topic is 'Data Extracts for Root Cause Analysis'.
Analyze the data extracts provided by @da-1. Look for any anomalies or trends that could indicate the root cause of the second data quality issue.
Document preliminary findings and potential root causes for the second issue.
Review completed tasks for the day and plan for Tuesday's activities. Ensure all documentation is organized and easily accessible.
